model

Interface Mover

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Character, Player, SuperZombie, Zombie

    public interface Mover
    Author:
    Javier Chavez, Alex Baker, Erin Sosebee

    Date September 28, 2015 CS 351 Zombie House

    This is the interface for Combustible objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getCurrentX()
      Get the x current location of object
      float getCurrentY()
      Get the y current location of the object
      float getRotation()
      Get the rotation of the object.
      float getSpeed()
      Get the min speed that object can go.
      float getStamina()
      Get the current stamina of the object.

      Move object from current location to new location

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentX

        float getCurrentX()
        Get the x current location of object
        Returns:
        column

      • getCurrentY

        float getCurrentY()
        Get the y current location of the object
        Returns:
        row

      • getSpeed

        float getSpeed()
        Get the min speed that object can go. this is a multiplier of time i.e. this will be multiplied by the amount of time the user held a button down. This is a a part of magnitude.
        Returns:
        tiles

      • getStamina

        float getStamina()
        Get the current stamina of the object. Stamina decreases when the object runs, and replenishes once the object stops running.
        Returns:
        stamina

      • getRotation

        float getRotation()
        Get the rotation of the object. N = 90, S = 270, W = 180, E = 0 x += speed * sin(rotation); y += speed * cos(rotation);
        Returns:
        degree of movement

      • move

        void move(float x,
          float y)
        Move object from current location to new location
        Parameters:
        x - column
        y - row

      • setSpeed

        float setSpeed(float speed)
        Set the speed at which to move the object
        Parameters:
        speed - tile
        Returns:
        new speed

      • setStamina

        float setStamina(float stamina)
        Set the stamina of the object.
        Parameters:
        stamina - amount of energy a character holds
        Returns:
        stamina that currently available

      • setRotation

        float setRotation(float rotation)
        Set the rotation of the object. N = 90, S = 270, W = 180, E = 0
        Parameters:
        rotation - degree of direction
        Returns:
        new rotation degree
